message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. I'm asking for $12,000 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth considerably more to me.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $10,750?

I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet at $10,750. My maximum offer remains at $9,500. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
